text: Lakemont is an unincorporated community in Rabun County, Georgia, United States, located in a mountainous area between U.S. Route 23/441 and Lake Rabun. Lakemont has a post office with ZIP code 30552. A post office named Lakemont was established in 1914. The community was so named on account of its elevated location near Lake Burton. ==References== ==External links== *Historic Lakemont Village Category:Unincorporated communities in Rabun County, Georgia Category:Unincorporated communities in Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Lakemont, Georgia
